hero.description: FloorOneX helps homeowners and businesses connect with verified flooring installers. Request quotes, compare offers, and manage your flooring project from start to finish.

dashboard.title: FloorOneX Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage quotes, jobs, and flooring professionals in one place

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose FloorOneX?
whyChooseUs.description: We simplify flooring projects by connecting customers with trusted professionals through a transparent and easy-to-use platform.

lightningFast.title: Fast Quotes
lightningFast.description: Receive multiple quotes from verified flooring professionals in a short time.

modular.title: Verified Installers
modular.description: All providers are vetted to ensure quality, reliability, and professionalism.

responsive.title: All-in-One Platform
responsive.description: Manage quotes, communication, and payments in one single place.

performance.title: Transparent Pricing
performance.description: Compare offers clearly with no hidden fees or surprises.

features.title: Platform Features
features.description: Everything you need to plan, book, and manage flooring projects

performanceMetrics.title: Project Insights
performanceMetrics.description: Monitor progress, quality, and performance of your flooring jobs.

seo.title: Regional Coverage
seo.description: Service coverage across cities and regions

oneClickDeployment.title: Easy Job Booking
oneClickDeployment.description: Request, confirm, and start your flooring project with minimal steps.

fileStructure.title: FloorOneX App
fileStructure.description: Each flooring project follows a clear and structured workflow.

scalableEnvironments.title: Scalable Platform
scalableEnvironments.description: FloorOneX scales automatically as demand and projects grow.

globalDeployments.title: Nationwide Coverage
globalDeployments.description: Access flooring professionals across multiple cities and regions.

templates.sectionDescription: Browse flooring services offered by trusted professionals.

responsiveTemplates.title: Accessible on Any Device
responsiveTemplates.description: Use FloorOneX seamlessly on mobile, tablet, or desktop.

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.description: Customers use the platform for free. Providers pay only when they win jobs.

components.name: Customer
components.description: Request quotes and manage flooring projects

tooltips.license: For personal and business flooring projects
tooltips.code: Payments are held securely until job completion

tooltips.license: Use FloorOneX to acquire unlimited clients

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large flooring companies and chains

testimonials.title: Trusted by Customers & Professionals
testimonials.description: Thousands of users rely on FloorOneX for their flooring projects.
testimonials.author: Michael Brown
testimonials.quote: "FloorOneX helped us win more clients and manage projects more efficiently. It's a game changer."

footer.title: Need more details?
footer.description: Contact our team for partnerships or enterprise solutions.

modal.title: Coming Soon
modal.description: This feature is under development and will be available shortly.

faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about FloorOneX

download.question: How do I request a quote?
download.answer: Create an account, submit your project details, and receive quotes from local professionals.

updates.question: Are providers verified?
updates.answer: Yes, all flooring professionals are vetted before joining the platform.

clientProjects.question: Do I need to pay upfront?
clientProjects.answer: Payments are released only after job milestones are completed.

framework.question: What flooring types are supported?
framework.answer: Wood, laminate, vinyl, LVT, carpet, and more.

support.question: Is support available?
support.answer: Yes, support is available for both customers and providers.

custom.question: Can I request custom services?
custom.answer: Yes, you can request tailored flooring solutions from providers.

commercial.question: How does the provider commission work?
commercial.answer: Providers pay a commission only when they successfully complete a job.

responsive.question: Can I use FloorOneX on mobile?
responsive.answer: Yes, the platform is fully responsive and works on all devices.

refund.question: What if I'm not satisfied?
refund.answer: Our support team will assist in resolving any issues with your project.

import.question: How do I get started?
import.answer: Sign up, create your project or provider profile, and start using FloorOneX.

footer.title: Connecting Flooring Professionals Nationwide
footer.description: FloorOneX brings customers and flooring experts together across the UK.
